parameters: An unmanned, and unmarked little boat.
Would you like a closer look?
Upon closer inspection, you find a name along the side
\fiStrange, I've never seen this boat before.
One of many ships that import goods from other regions.
Currently, the feif's logging ship is still out on it's
In the distance, you see a fishing ship anchored in
place. Even at a distance, you know the town's
Sorry, can't talk right now, tending to the
I can't believe I slept in and missed the
Have you delivered the medicine to the Baron
Now why would you say something like that?
I tried to heal my brother with it and, and
\fiKilled\fa by the potion you forced me to
make! You're done, Brue, the Baron will
I wouldn’t be rushing in there if I were
Did I just hear you confessing to \fimurdering
Who is the Baron going to believe?
His beautiful wife, our beloved Baroness,
disobeying her master and giving innocent
villagers the wrong potion, resulting in \n<Brue>
Is it a fight you want?
You're not my master, not anymore. I will
be heard, one way or another. \n<Ferrowyn>
Is it a fight you want?
Is it a fight that you want? I will be
Ferrowyn, dear, let’s not get ahead of
You we’re just about to frame me for murder
I know, but it doesn’t have to be that way.
Maybe, there is no murder or conspiracy at
all, just a bright future for you, dear.
Maybe, as a token of Brue's and my gratitude
to you for your \figreat service,\fa and \n<Lady Catherine>
discretion, we offer you the certificate of
master alchemist and a satchel of gold.
There is a whole new world waiting for you
somewhere away from our shores.\n<Lady Catherine>
I’m sure you’ll have a great life there!
I am not that easily bought, you... You
I want justice for me and my poor brother.
I could throw you into the dark dungeon and
let the bats do the job, but I’m offering
Now, if you don’t respond to my offer with
the exact words of “Thank you, your lady,”
I shall have my guards escort you there at
The knight hands you a bag filled with gold, and the
I'm glad we came to an understanding!
I will not go down without a fight!
\fiKeifer, I didn't give in. I tried to fight till
the very end. They didn't kill me, so I'll
probably be banished from our land forever.
\fiThough I am wounded, and will be without
a penny to my name, it would all have been
in the world, in fact, you constantly lie
\fiYou’re still my brother, and I can’t
let your murder be covered up. I’ve tried
my best, and I am ready to face my defeat
